Summary: two lights traveling north to south stayed equal distant apart and disapeared
trends: There has been one other sighting in Ider
There were no other sightings in Ider on or around November 25th 2009
divs: sighting detailsat approx. 5:20pm my wife called me outside to see something strange in the sky. i saw two lights that appeared to be stars moving accross the sky from north to south. the objects were approx. 1\2 to 1 mile apart but stayed at a perfectly equal distance from each other.these were not plains, i know because there were plains traveling around the area with flashing lights, not solid ones like the objects.as the objects flew in front of my wife and i one of the objects seemed to get dimmer and dimmer until it eventually disapeared. as that object stared to dim the other one got much brighter. the brightest object a few seconds later also disapeared. less then two seconds later we saw the two objects several miles away traveling up and quickly out of sight.not sure what it was just thought it was very strange and would like to see if anyone else has seem something like this before
